ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Verant Bats .000 for bards as usual
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve playing msostly DAOC the few weeks but decided to give SOL a try. Not very impressive response from the incumbant in my opinion. I will try some Luclin
ygData.messageBody:
I've playing msostly DAOC the few weeks but decided to give SOL a try. Not
very impressive response from the incumbant in my opinion. I will try some
Luclin zones soon, but the improvements I've seen so far aren't very eye
pleasing. And DAOC runs so much more smoothly on my pretty average system
(PIII 733, 256MB, GForce2 MX 64MB, iDSL connection).

Some of the stuff is downright ugly. The DE female's helmets are awful. My
Sentry is sometimes pink and sometimes silver.

I'm kinda disapointed. Hope others find some good news.

Tzeetch, Troubador of Xegony
Asmerelda, Healer of Lancelot

--- Stephen McCloskey <s.mccloskey@...> wrote:

<HR>
<html><body>


<tt>
Anyone else notice that we now strum the back side of our lutes.  I
am also<BR>
a bit disappointed that we play everything so fast.  The
strumming<BR>
animation is over in less then half the "old" time.  It's
like I am playing<BR>
death metal now, with out the head banging.<BR>
<BR>
-Steve<BR>
<BR>
At 06:24 AM 12/5/01 -0500, you wrote:<BR>
>Not too add its the class they have problems with after the majority
of<BR>
>major patches.  You think that they would learn to double check
you guys.<BR>
><BR>
>Mu<BR>
>58 Enchanter <BR>
>Tunare Server<BR>
><BR>
>-----Original Message-----<BR>
>From: Daniel Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]<BR>
>Sent: Wednesday, December 05, 2001 2:29 AM<BR>
>To: EQ Bards<BR>
>Subject: [eqbards] Verant Bats .000 for bards as usual<BR>
><BR>
><BR>
>After waiting all day for servers to come up - and all night for patch
to<BR>
>work - I log into the "New and Improved" game to discover
that bard songs<BR>
>are basically 99 pct broken.  You'll sing songs and every 30
minutes or so -<BR>
>you'll get about 3 ticks of the song - then it will stop working
again.<BR>
><BR>
>Nice testing Verant.  A few glitches on release - okay I can live
with<BR>
>that - but completely breaking one of the classes - Way to go!<BR>
><BR>
>Slyde<BR>
><BR>
><BR>
><BR>
><BR>
